message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves you with a good chunk!
I'm feeling generous, Alice, but let's make it snappy. Time is money, literally!
Okay Bob, let's try this again.  A fair deal for both of us.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a very fair deal. Take it or leave it, but we're running out of time!
Bob, let's stop wasting time. This is my final offer - it's a good deal considering inflation is working against you.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable but this is getting absurd.  I'll take a slight loss to end this now. This is my final offer.
